name: Purego
description:
An infinite runner rhythm game. 

Jump left or right at the beat. Keep away from evil monsters to maintain your purity. 

Some monsters remains soul form and can be only seen when your wave reaches them. Try not to be knocked down by invisible danger!

Purego是一款无限跑酷游戏。

随着节拍左右移动，保持你的纯洁，远离那些邪恶生物。

一些怪物处于灵魂状态，只能被你发出的波动探测到，别被那些隐形的危险打到了！

This game was made for Global Game Jam:https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/migration
